title: How do I update my phone?
answer:
![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111349520001.gif)

Back up important data, such as your contacts, messages, and call log before updating.

l   Online update: Before the update, make sure your phone has Internet access.

Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **About phone** > **System update** > **Online update**, and follow the onscreen instructions.

**Figure 1-1 **

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111349240002.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111349554003.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111349505004.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111349554003.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111350280005.gif)

l   Local update: Download the update package from http://consumer.huawei.com, insert a microSD card into your phone, and copy the **dload** folder of the update package to the microSD card's root directory.

Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **About phone** > **System update** > **Local update**, and follow the onscreen instructions. For details, see the update guide for the update package.

**Figure 1-2 **

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111350213006.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111349554003.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111350718007.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111349554003.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111350893008.gif)

Note: The figures are for your reference only. Actual screens may vary slightly.
